urls.description: Most of this comes from what we throw away and flush, even if we don't live near the sea. Plastic harms the environment and kills wildlife, but we can all play our part in fighting plastic pollution by taking simple steps to reduce our reliance on plastic. Sign up and you will receive a new challenge every week, with support, advice and inspiration on reducing plastic, sustainable swaps and much more. By signing up you'll also be in with a chance of winning some plastic-free goodies to get you started on
